global_conflict_summaries.summary: Kinetic and drone strikes ongoing; energy/logistics intermittently targeted
Maritime and border flashpoints persist with periodic escalations
global_conflict_summaries.impact: Logistics and price volatility risk moderate

global_conflict_summaries.summary: Routine military posturing and ADIZ incursions
global_conflict_summaries.impact: Shipping and semiconductor supply chain monitoring warranted
